title: Rebozo, 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: warp resist dyed before weaving (jaspe), warp-face plain weave, knotted fringe
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 276 x 76.5 cm (9 ft. 11/16 in. x 30 1/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of International Business Machines Corp.
description: Indigo blue ground with very small spots of white and light blue jaspeado (ikat) patterning in horizontal bands. Elaborately knotted fringe 14 inches deep.
